Owen reported the eradication of a low

		generation colony a month ago. That's why 

		MICOM wants onsite assessment.

Sounds more like some idiot at

		Military Intelligence Command

		wants to get me and my cap troopers 

		killed...

	The Intelligence Officer reddens.

Take your group down to P and have a 

		look see. Leave the thinking to us,

		Lieutenant. That's not your job.

My job is to protect the lives of my

		soldiers so they can kill bugs, Major,

		and if you're walking me into a trap-

Bugs don't lay traps... They aren't

		intelligent ! Unlike you, they're stupid

		enough to follow orders !

That'll be all, Major. Dismissed.

	The Intelligence Officer disappears abruptly. A new hologram appears.

	Rasczak's jaw drops. It's his former student Carl Jenkins, now a Colonel,

	weary and pissed off.

This conference is over. Do your duty,

		Lieutenant. That's an order.

	Rasczak recovers, salutes stiffly.
Yes, sir.

heading.subject: 132	INT	PRE-FAB SLEEPING UNIT
heading.raw_text: 132	INT	PRE-FAB SLEEPING UNIT - DAY - JOHNNY AND DIZZY

segments.content:
are making love. The door pops open. Rasczak stands there. Dizzy ducks under

	the covers. Johnny manages a salute.

Corporal, the Roughnecks are moving

		out for Planet P immediately. Get

		yourself squared away and report to

		Gillespie for logistics.
Yes, sir !

Who's that with you ?

	Dizzy shows herself, grinning.

Report in ten minutes.

	Rasczak slams the door shut on them. They fall back into one anothers arms,

	laughing as they resume lovemaking.
Planet P ? What kind of name is that ?

They ran out of names a long time

		ago in this part of the galaxy.

heading.subject: 133	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 133	EXT	PLANET P - BAD LANDS - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS

segments.content:
move through canyons of towering wind-carved rock formations.

	Gillespie carries the communications package.

I don't understand it, Lieutenant.

		It's not getting anything from 4th

		Brigade...

		not even their transponder.
Keep trying, Sergeant.

heading.subject: 134	EXT	CANYON FLOOR
heading.raw_text: 134	EXT	CANYON FLOOR - CONTINUING - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS

segments.content:
walk in a column far below. Something is watching from the above... HOPPERS,

	lots of them, moving from rock to rock for better position.

heading.subject: 135	EXT	CANYON FLOOR
heading.raw_text: 135	EXT	CANYON FLOOR - CONTINUING - DAY - ACE

segments.content: sees something out of the corner of his eye.

The hoppers hit. Several Roughnecks go down. Everyone opens up. 

	Dive-bombing bugs are blown to bits. Roughnecks set them on fire 

	when they hit the ground.

Johnny, watch out !

	A burning bug hurls itself at Johnny. Johnny jumps out of the way as

	Dizzy fires, blowing it apart. The deadly hoppers seem to be everywhere

	above them in the rocks.

heading.subject: 136	EXT	FLAT LANDS
heading.raw_text: 136	EXT	FLAT LANDS - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS

segments.content:
move out into the open. In the distance they see 4th Brigade HQ, a walled 

	compound and partially constructed landing pad.

Gillespie, put in call for retrieval.

		We're off this rock.

		Gillespie, do you read me ?

Two hoppers are pulling Gillespie up into the rocks where other bugs

	join to feast.

Throw a rifle !

	Dizzy tosses her Morita to Rasczak. Gillespie writhes in the hopper's

	claws. Rasczak fires, killing Gillespie.

I expext any one here to do the same

		for me... Rico, Watkins, Flores, Levy

		prepare for rear guard action. The rest

		of you make for 4th Brigade.

	Johnny and the others cover the Roughneck retreat as hoppers soar down

	on the flat lands from the canyon walls.
Johnny and the others blast bugs out of the air.
A second wave of hoppers come in.
For now, the sky is clear.

heading.subject: 137	EXT	4TH BRIGADE HQ
heading.raw_text: 137	EXT	4TH BRIGADE HQ - DAY - THE OUTPOST

segments.content:
is 50 meters by 100, standard issue pre-fab. The Roughnecks land on the

	compound wall. Inside, WORKER BUGS graze on the remains of 200

	dead cap troopers strewn over the complex.

Jeez, Command really humped the bunk

		on this one...

	Rasczak turns away. Roughnecks engage in the sport of methodically

	killing the workers.

Rico, you're acting Sergeant now.

		My last Sergeant lost the com pack.

		Put together a search team and find

		the radio shack.

		We need retrieval.
Yes, sir.

heading.subject: 138	INT	4TH BRIGADE HQ
heading.raw_text: 138	INT	4TH BRIGADE HQ - OFFICE COMPLEX - DAY - JOHNNY

segments.content:
surveys the aftermath of the last stand with Rasczak, insect and human dead

	everywhere.
It's here, sir.

heading.subject: 139	INT	COMMINICATIONS
heading.raw_text: 139	INT	COMMINICATIONS - DAY - RASCZAK AND JOHNNY

segments.content:
enter the radio room. A DEAD MAJOR is slumped over the console with

	hole in the back of his head. Johnny checks the equipment. 

	It' dead, too.
Diz, see what you can do.

I'm on it !

	Dizzy goes to work. Rasczak checks the wound in the back of the dead major's

	head.
What's that look like to you, Rico ?
Looks like a bug was in his brain, sir.

Lieutenant, I think you're gonna

		wanna see this, sir.

heading.subject: 140	INT	MESS HALL
heading.raw_text: 140	INT	MESS HALL - DAY - A BUG HOLE

segments.content: in the middle of the floor is surrounded by carnage.

Dirty bugs came in right when they 

		were having chow !

Gas that hole and seal it.

	Then they hear a sound. Tap tap tap. Rasczak signals for quiet. Tap tap tap tap.

	It's coming from the kitchen.

enter cautiously. The noise is coming from a freezer. Ace stands ready to fire.

	Johnny levers open the door, jumps back as GENERAL OWEN, 60, tumbles out

	face first.
Officer on the deck, sir.

Pick up the general !

	Roughnecks prop him up. General Owen tries to talk, but no words come out.

	Rasczak bends down to listen.
Get out... you gotta get me out...!

General Owen, sir ?

	The old man grins, hugely relieved.

At ease, Lieutenant. Thank God for you,

		for all of you...this is grand...

		so where's the boat ?

heading.subject: 142	INT	COMMUNICATIONS
heading.raw_text: 142	INT	COMMUNICATIONS - HALLWAY - DAY - JOHNNY AND RASCZAK

segments.content: help the old General, now wrapped in a blanket, rambling.

I was forced to hide, of course. The security

		of the Federation in this theater of operations

		was at stake !

Diz, what's with the uplink ?

	Dizzy lokks up from where she is working on the radio controls.
Workin on it...!

They get in your mind... they make you do

		things ! Look here... They did it to Farley...!

	He points at the hole of the dead major's head.

The distress call... The bugs wanted us 

		to rescue you...!

Oh, you can be sure of it ! They were

		biding their time... waiting for the most

		opportune moment !

	Rasczak's lost interest in the general. He's on the com.

To all Roughnecks, this is Rasczak.

		Prepare for attack. Repeat. We are

		going to be attacked...!

They weren't gonna do it to me.

		Oh no ! I know too many secrets !

	Rasczak looks at General Owen with contempt.

Fire in the hole !

	An explosion in the mess hall closes the bug hole.

heading.subject: 143	EXT	OFFICE COMPLEX
heading.raw_text: 143	EXT	OFFICE COMPLEX - DAY - GENERAL OWEN

segments.content:
blinks as he steps out into the light. Roughnecks snap to attention. 

	General Owen looks at the carnage that was once his command and

	begins to keen, collapsing to his knees.

Oh God...! My soldiers...! All of my

		boys and girls...!

	The Roughnecks are shocked. They've never seen a general break down before.

	Lieutenant Rasczak slaps Owen hard.

Shut up ! Your soldier's dead and

		you're not !
I know... I wish you'd shoot me...

I oughta !

	And it looks like Rasczak just might, but just then Ace touches down

	next to Johnny and Rasczak.
Lieutenant, we got trouble !

and Johnny join other stunned Roughnecks to see THOUSANDS OF BUGS on

	the march from every direction. Bug batteries open up in the distance.

Warm it all up ! Everything you got !

		Levy, collect the big guns from the 

		towers. Watkins, put General Owen 

		with the wounded. Rico, where's my 

		communications ?
What's going on, Diz ?

I got power ! Gimme a minute !

	Johnny runs for the communications room.
We don't have a minute !

has the board up. Outside the battle has begun. Nukes go WOMP ! and

	pulse guns chatter.
What frequency ?
All bands.

Roughneck patrol to battle group...

			Roughneck patrol to battle group...

This is Rodger Young... What's going

			on down there ? We're taking plasma !

			We have Orion P-11 as clear !
SHUT UP, SIR ! We need pick up now !
What is your position ?

Landing zone is extremely hostile.

			Come down on this transmission !

Inside 4th brigade compound ?

			That's crazy !

Then I hope you have a crazy 

			pilot ! Keep the line open, Dizzy !

	Johnny races out the door.

heading.subject: 146	EXT	4TH BRIGADE HQ
heading.raw_text: 146	EXT	4TH BRIGADE HQ - DAY - THE COMPOUND

segments.content:
is white hot as Roughnecks on the walls unload nukes. Johnny crosses 

	the compound, lands next to Rasczak on the wall.

Boat coming down, sir !

	The Roughnecks stop firing as they run out of nukes.

I'm empty...all nuked out... Me, too !

	Johnny scans the battlefield. Nukes have turned the surface into dark glass.

	Now, out of the smoke, come the bugs, steaming glass cracking beneath 

	millions of marching feet.
Jeez, we musta killed a million already...!

Not enough, I guess.

	Sugar Watkins sees Genera Owen in the compound below,

	stumbling aimlessly among his dead soldiers.

General ! GENERAL, stay with the wounded...

		Sir, the general...!

Ah, the hell with him...

	Hoppers sweep into the compound. The Roughnecks open fire. General Owen

	make easy pickings for ones that get through.

Fall back... form a circle ! If no 

		living bug comes over that wall,

		we cannot be harmed.

	Dizzy arrives on thr bounce as the Roughnecks fall back into the compound.

	Bugs pile in over the walls. The circle affords them 360 degrees of kill zone.

Rico, Flores, Watkins, Levy ! We 

		control the sky until retrieval !

Yes, sir !

	Rasczak, Sugar Watkins, Johnny and Dizzy stand back-to-back in the center

	of the circle, sweeping the skies with the heavy guns from the towers.

	Hoppers are blown to pieces.
Getting low here, sir !
300 rounds and counting, sir !

Johnny looks up. A RETRIEVAL BOAT hurtles down through bursts of 

	bug plasma, takes a grazing hit, rights itself with retros and lands within 

	the circle. Roughnecks cheer, saved !
Sergeant, secure the boat !

Yes, sir !

	Roughnecks move to protect the boat. The hatch blows open.

Board the wounded !

	Dead bugs ring the compound walls, forming ramps for living insect

	soldiers to enter the compound in greater numbers.

Move to retrieval on my command !

		First group, now...!

	The circle shrinks as Roughnecks fall back and board the boat.

	More and more bugs pile in over the compound walls.

Alright, Flores ! Levy ! Rico...!

	Suddenly, the ground collapses under Rasczak. He falls in to his waist,

	vomits blood as something chews on him from below.

Cover us, Ace !

	Ace and the others fire from the boat. Johnny and Dizzy fire at the ground

	around Rasczak. Rasczak stops screaming. They try to pull him free.
Hit your jets, sir !

I can't My legs are gone...

		Get on the boat...

	The compund wall collapses. A wave of bugs charges in.

Rico, tell'em to glass this goddam planet.

		I've never seen so many bugs upstairs at

		the same time...

We're not leaving you here, sir !

	Weakly, Rasczak picks up his pulse gun, checks the power.

This is my farm. Get on the boat,

		NOW ! That's an order, Sergeant.
Give'em hell, sir !

heading.subject: Johnny and Dizzy run for the boat. Rasczak opens fire, picking his shots,
heading.raw_text: Johnny and Dizzy run for the boat. Rasczak opens fire, picking his shots,

segments.content: but soon the bugs are all over him.

C'mon you sons of bitches !

		There's no bug alive can kill a

		real mAAAAAAA !

	At the boat, Dizzy turns to look back at Rasczak. A hopper swoops

	down on Dizzy, it's claws ripping into her abdomen.

heading.subject: GET IT OFF GET IT OFF
heading.raw_text: GET IT OFF GET IT OFF

segments.content:
Johnny blows the bug off her back. Blood sprays from a deep gash in 

	her neck. Johnny picks her up, tries to stop the blood with his hand.

	The life is leaving her eyes.

Hang on, Diz... don't die on me...

	A TANKER BUG breaches the broken wall. Ace jumps out to help his

	friends. The hatch closes just as the tanker bug sprays. The boat blasts

	off, dripping metal.

holds Dizzy in his arms, drenched in her blood, fighting G-forces as the 

	boats heads for orbit.

I bought the farm, didn't I,

		Johnny ?
No, you're gonna be alright, Diz !

It's alright 'cause I got to have you,

		Johnny...

	MEDICS push Johnny aside, go to work on Dizzy.

slams into the cockpit. Out the front screen, violent bursts of BUG PLASMA

	fill the sky as they break atmosphere.

Get on the com and tell Fleet to

		glass that rock...!

	The co-pilot turns around. It's Zander. His eyes narrow.
On whose authority, Corporal ?

This would be mine, sir. Acting 

		Sergeant John Rico. I've assumed

		command on this mission.

	The pilot turns around. It's Carmen.
Johnny...! I thought you were dead !

I'm not, but alot of my soldiers are.

		Glass the planet !

	Johnny leaves. Carmen punches up Fleet Command.

Rodger Young, this is inbound shuttle

		De Ruyter with an official request from

		the Mobile Infantery to bombard

		Planet P-11...

heading.subject: 149	INT	BOAT
heading.raw_text: 149	INT	BOAT - CARGO BAY - DAY - JOHNNY

segments.content:
returns to Dizzy's side as the medics struggle to save her. Blood pours

	out of her mouth. Her body thrashes.

Dizzy dies. A Medic slaps her. Her head lolls, mouth open, eyes blank.

	They drop her and move on to the next casualty. Johnny sits there,

	stunned. Carmen enters from the cockpit.

Negative on your request. Fleet 

		Command has the battle group 

		on standby...

		Carmen sees Dizzy lying dead on the deck.
...I'm sorry.

We gotta choke on the mud and the

		blood and Fleet can't be bothered to

		spit.

No, I think something's up. The Sky

		Marshall's here.

	She points out for a viewing port. Johnny looks. Fifteen battle groups, 

	100 ships strong, lay off Planet P, all of them dwarfed by the Sky

	Marshall's flagship, Buenos Aires.
I thought you were KIA, Johnny...
That was just a mix up.

You look so... I don't know, you 

		look like you've really been in it.

What happened to your eye ?

	Carmen touches the scar over her eye.

Almost got knocked out of the sky 

		over Big K.
I like it. It's kinda...you.

heading.subject: 150	EXT	BATTLE GROUP
heading.raw_text: 150	EXT	BATTLE GROUP - ORION SYSTEM - THE BOAT

segments.content:
lands on the flight deck of the Rodger Young in the midst of the 

	flotilla.

heading.subject: 151	INT	OFFICERS QUARTERS
heading.raw_text: 151	INT	OFFICERS QUARTERS - DAY CYCLE - ZANDER

segments.content:
enters, watches Carmen dress. She hums as she checks herself in the

	mirror, touches thr scar over her eye, smiles.
Where are you going ?
A funeral.

That girl who died on the way up

		...his girl ?
Yeah.
How do you feel about him now ?
I don't know, Zander.
I do.

heading.subject: 152	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 152	INT	RODGER YOUNG - GUNNERY DECK - CARMEN

segments.content:
enters as Johnny speaks. Dizzy is laid out in dress gray. The surviving

	Roughnecks have gathered to pay final respects.

Dizzy bought the farm. She was my

		good friend, and friens are the best 

		luck anyone gets... But in war, we must

		go on without our friends. We take

		with us their memory, and we are left

		to wonder if there is meaning in their

		death. Let me tell you what it is:

		Dizzy bough the farm so we can keep

		on fighting.

	Several INTELLIGENCE OFFICERS march into the bay.

Officer on deck !

	Everyone snaps to attention. Colonel Carl Jenkins strides into the room.

	His eyes are hollow, and he looks grim. He returns Johnny's salute, 

	nods to Carmen.
Please continue, Sergeant.

Dizzy wouldn't want our tears. She'd

		want us to remember her... with a

		vengeance. So go out and kill a bug 

		for Dizzy. Kill as many as you can.

		You are her revenge, and every bug 

		you kill honors her death.

	Johnny nods to the GUNNERY CREW. They load Dizzy's body into a

	tube. Johnny steps back, salutes Dizzy. Everyone salutes.
Womb to tomb, cap trooper !

Womb to tomb !

	The CREW CHIEF fires the tube. Out the viewports, A PULSE OF LIGHT 

	disperses into space. The Roughnecks file out. Carl approaches.

	Carmen takes Johnny and Carl by the hand.

Well, look at this. The three of us back

		together again.
How are you, Carl ?

Johnny, I'm sorry it had to be your

		unit on Planet P. That mission had

		a very low survival probability...
Bugs laid a trap, didn't they ?

Elegant proof of intelligence, 

		isn't it ? We thought there might

		be a brain on P.

You knew and you sent them

		anyway ?

A colony has to reach a certain size

		before it produces a Brain... we think

		300 generations. Woulda too expensive

		to launch an operation if there wasn't a

		Brain...

	Carl sees the way Carmen is looking at him, like he's a bug.

You don't approve. Well, too bad.

		We're in this for the species, boys

		and girls. It's simple numbers, they

		have more, and everyday I have to

		make decisions that send hundreds of

		people like you to their deaths.

Didn't they tell you, Colonel ?

		That's what cap troopres are good

		for.

	Carl allows himself a tiny smile.

Hope you're ready for more. We're

		going back to P to capture that Brain.
The Roughnecks are always ready, sir.

I hear they need a new Lieutenant...

		Want the job ?

I'll take it... until I get killed

		or you find someone better.

	KLAXONS sound. Suddenly, everyone has someplace to go.
Hope you get your Brain Bug, Carl.

It's good to see you two. It reminds

		me of the way things were before...

	Carl turns abruptly and heads away. His entourage follows.
Take care, wilya Johnny ?
See you on the bounce !

heading.subject: 153	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 153	INT	RODGER YOUNG - COMMAND & CONTROL - CARMEN

segments.content:
steps onto the bridge. There's a new NUMBER 2 sitting in Zander's chair.

	She's right out of Tereshkova, and she looks scared. 

	Carmen turns to Captain Deladier.
Where's Lieutenant Barcalow ?

He requested a combat assignment.

		There's always a need for experienced

		pilots on the ground.

		I had no choice but to let him go...

		He said you'd understand.

	Carmen bites her lip, takes first chair. Deladier feels bad for her, knows

	she's made a painful decision.

heading.subject: 154	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 154	INT	RODGER YOUNG - DROP ROOM - ROUGHNECKS

segments.content: are suiting up. Ace enters.

Officer on the deck !

	Roughnecks fall in. Johnny steps into the room. There are many new and

	much younger faces.

I only have two rules. Rule one,

		everyone fights. Rule two, no one

		quits. If you don't do your job,

		I'll kill you myself.

		Do you get me ?
We get you, sir !

(to Ace, sotto voce)

		Who're all these kids ?

We got reinforced. Most of'em

		just got outa boot...
We're the old men, Ace.

heading.subject: 155	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 155	EXT	PLANET P - 4TH BRIGADE HQ - DAY - CARGO SHIPS

segments.content:
have landed. Cap troopers set fire to huge piles of dead bugs. BULLDOZERS

	push bodies into a mass grave, among them Rasczak. 

	Johnny walks past with his team.

We'll take this high ground. Lookouts

		there and therte and up there. If the

		bugs come upstairs in this neighbor-hood,

		we'll be the first to know.

Got it. Fleet tactical wants to know

		where they can deploy the skimmers.

Down there on the flats, eh ?

		Listen up, Roughnecks ! Our

		primary objective is to assist

		our friends from the Fleet...

	Roughnecks boo.

Alright, cut it out. We will deploy

		from skimmers in teams of six.

		If the bugs open up a battery,

		we put it out of business.

		Any questions ?

	A HERCULES CARGO BOAT hurtles out of the sky and lands on the high

	ground Johnny has intended forb his H.Q. Johnny scowls, marches over

	to the boat and confronts a FLEET OFFICER.
Would'ya mind moving your boat ?

Better talk to the boss.

	The cargo bays open to deploy FLEET SKIMMERS. Zander jumps down

	to oversee the operation.

You're standing on my H.Q., 

		Lieutenant !

This is a Fleet-driven operation, son,

		and the Fleet thinks my boat will be 

		safer on the high ground.

		You can have everything else, eh ?

You heard the Sky Marshall...

		Move it all down -

	Suddenly, in the distance, bug batteries open fire, not one but twenty.

	Zander and Johnny share a look of concern.

Rodger Young, prepare to receice 

		outgoing fire...!

			(to his crew chief)

		I'll take the first group.
Saddle up, boys, that's our trash !

heading.subject: 156	EXT	SPACE
heading.raw_text: 156	EXT	SPACE - PLANET P ORBIT - BUG PLASMA

segments.content:
begins to take a toll on the battle group as the orbiting ships lay their eggs.

	Cap Troopers are scliced as they drop.

heading.subject: 157	EXT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 157	EXT	RODGER YOUNG - BRIDGE - CAPTAIN DELADIER

segments.content: turns to Carmen.

Evasive action !

	Carmen dodges other starships, turns to her new number 2.
Prepare for warp !

Yes, ma'am ! Warp in 5... 4...

		3...!

	KA-WHAM ! The Rodger Young takes a direct hit.

heading.subject: 158	EXT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 158	EXT	RODGER YOUNG - PLANET P ORBIT - THE RODGER YOUNG

segments.content:
is cut in two. The rear section explodes, the forward section begins to burn towards

	the bridge.

heading.subject: 159	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 159	INT	RODGER YOUNG - BRIDGE - CAPTAIN DELADIER

segments.content: calmy evacuates the bridge. Power fails and so does the gravity.

This is Rodger Young, we're going

		down... Repeat, this is Rodger Young,

		we're going down...!
Ibanez...LET'S GO !

heading.subject: 160	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 160	INT	RODGER YOUNG - ESCAPE CORRIDOR - CARMEN

segments.content:
and Captain Deladier run for the lifepods. An explosion flips the corridor.

	Captain Deladier's leg is crushed when an airlock closes on her.
Carmen hits the release, pulls her free. Deladier pushes Carmen away.
Leave me, Lieutenant ! That's an order !
No way, ma'am !

heading.subject: 161	INT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 161	INT	RODGER YOUNG - LIFE POD BAY - CARMEN

segments.content:
pushes into the chaotic life pod bay. PANICKED CREW shoving, screaming,

	fighting. The ship pitches. They tumble, landing near a pod. Carmen jumps

	for it, pulls Deladier in after.

heading.subject: 162	EXT	RODGER YOUNG
heading.raw_text: 162	EXT	RODGER YOUNG - PLANET P ORBIT - THE RODGER YOUNG

segments.content: disintegrates as lifepods shoot away toward the planet.

heading.subject: 163	INT	LIFEPOD
heading.raw_text: 163	INT	LIFEPOD - PLANET P ORBIT - CARMEN

segments.content:
navigates through a graveyard of floating wreckage, dead cap troopers,

	someone's trombone. She sets her beacon and the pod plummets 

	downward.

Mayday, mayday ! This is 

		Lieutenant Carmen Ibanez in 

		lifepod RY63... I'm going in...

heading.subject: 164	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 164	EXT	PLANET P - BASE CAMP - DAY - ROUGHNECKS

segments.content: board the Skimmers. Zander approaches Johnny, upset.

What's your problem now,

		Lieutenant ?

The Rodger Young just burned up...

	Johnny's face falls.

Any survivors ?

	Zander points. Far in the distance, a glowing pod plummets toward the planet.

	Johnny tracks it on his "head up".
is shaken violently as the pod hits atmosphere.

heading.subject: 166	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 166	EXT	PLANET P - DAY - CARMEN'S POD

segments.content: hits and goes straight through the crust of Planet P.

heading.subject: THE POD
heading.raw_text: 167	INT	BUG CITY TUNNELS - DAY - THE POD

segments.content:
comes to rest. Carmen blows the hatch, pulls Deladier out, grabs a Morita

	pulse rifle. Tunnels lead in every direction.

This is Lieutenant Carmen Ibanez.

		Is anyone receiving ?
grabs the handset from Ace.

Affirmative ! Carmen, this is Roughneck

		base camp... What is your present 

		location ?

heading.subject: CARMEN
heading.raw_text: 169	INT	BUG CITY TUNNELS - DAY - CARMEN

segments.content:
sees a warrior coming at her from out of the shadows. Carmen fires a burst

	and kills it. Now there are two. Carmen backs up firing, but there are 

	too many.

My present location is 42 degrees 

		South by 176 degrees East...

		situation is extremely hostile...

They have her. She puts the barrel of the Morita in her mouth, but a claw 

	cut her trigger finger off at the knuckle.

heading.subject: 170	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 170	EXT	PLANET P - ROUGHNECK BASE CAMP - DAY - JOHNNY

segments.content: and Zander are horrified by what they hear.
We've gotta go get her !

You know as well as I do she's

		probably already dead.

	Johnny knows it's true, swallows bitterly, turns away. That's when he sees it. 

	Nearby, the ground shifts, a claw breaks through, a hole opens up and bugs

	boil up out of the ground.

Here they come !

	They turn and see a second bug hole open up.

We're outa here. Lieutenant, get

		your men into the skimmers. This

		real estate's about to go buggy.

Hey, just calm down, I'm giving

		the orders here-

	The entire area underneath the base camp collapses to form a huge new

	canyon. The Hercules boat topples, crushing Skimmers and unfortunate

	Fleet personnnel.

and the surviving Roughnecks pick themselves up. The are now 30 meters

	below the planet's surface. Above them, bugs line the wide rim of the

	newly formed canyon.

Form a perimeter !

	Through the dust, exposed bug tunnels can be seen in the canyon walls and

	piling out of them by the score, deadly Arachnid warriors. Johnny throws

	Zander a pulse cannon.
Make yourself useful, fly boy...

The Roughnecks open fire at the charging bug horde. Warriors are blown to 

	pieces. Gas grenades fly and H.E. rounds close tunnels. A maimed warrior 

	gets through and heads for Zander.

Johnny and Ace team up to blow it away. Zander takes a deep breath,

	loos around, impressed. The Roughnecks have killed a great many bugs.

Ace, get on the com. Tell Fleet we

		need retrieval... Sugar, salvage some

		armor and suit up Lieutenant Barcalow.

	Sugar Watkins tosses a bloody jump boot his way.
Thanks.

Fleet Command says retrieval's no go.

		The battle group's at safe distance...

		and we got another problem.

	Ace points out a Tanker bug that's been brough up to the rim. 

	Johnny sees another.

Looks like they're gonna hose us down...

	Johnny chews on this.

Alright... Listen up, Roughnecks.

		We're gonna head west down through

		bug city, pick up any Rodger Young 

		survivors we run across, and join A

		Company. Get me ?

We get you, sir !

	Zander, awkward in a power suit, confronts Johnny.
What do you think you're doing ?
I'm gonna save Carmen.

That would mean a comlete disregard

		for the mission objective. They hang

		you for that, Rico.

Yeah, that's right.

	Johnny and Zander stare each other down.
Let's go.

Move out.

	Johnny starts for the gaping mouth of an exposed bug tunnel and

	the others fall in behind him.
Bug hunt !

leads his deadly force through enemy territory. The Roughnecks kill

	everything that gets in their way. Zander lends his inexperienced hand.

Mr. Barcalow, save power, don't

		waste it on workers...

		Ace, tell Aardvark we're on our

		way...

Yes, sir !

	Warriors appear in the tunnel behind them.
Sugar, close the tunnel...!

Fire in the hole !

	Sugar Watkins fires an H.E. round and seals the tunnel.

heading.subject: 173	INT	BUG CITY
heading.raw_text: 173	INT	BUG CITY - FEEDING PIT - DAY - CARMEN

segments.content:
opens her eyes. She can hear BUGS CLICKING. She's in a pit filled 

	with human dead. A nearby carcass wears a uniform from 4th Brigade

	Off in the dark she hears HUMAN MOANING.

	She crawls over rotting corpses toward the sound. The moaning turns

	to SCREAMING. It's coming from outside the pit. She pulls herself

	up to peer over the edge.

heading.subject: 174	INT	BUG CITY
heading.raw_text: 174	INT	BUG CITY - THE ROYAL COURT - DAY - CARMEN

segments.content:
sees hundred of bugs at work, WARRIORS, WORKERS and dozens of 

	small (2 meters) CHARIOT BUGS. Aworker walks pas, stepping on her,

	but pays her no attention.

	She sees the source of the screaming:	Captain Deladier is hold

	between two warriors, and she's screaming because of what she sees,

The BRAIN BUG is huge (5 meters) and pulpy. I has vestigial legs that

	cannot support ist weight, and so it must be moved by a shifting carpet of

	chariot bugs.

A thorn-like PALP unfolds out of the brain bug and strikes, driving deep into

	Deladier's head and sucks her brains out.

Carmen watches horrified as Deladier dies. The suddenly a warrior grabs her

	from above and drags her out of the pit. She screams as its claws slice into 

	her limbs.

Now the brain bug comes for her. She sees the palp unfold, the thorn-like

	spike coming toward her. Carmen is no longer looking for escape.

	All she wants to do is die.

	Suddenly, every bug in the chamber stops as though to listen. Carmen hears it.

	A HIGH-PITCHED SQUEAL, getting louder. 

	Johnny enters the chamber alone.

	The warriors move toward him. He holds up a NUKE, source of the high-pitched

	tone. The ready light flashes. The Brain Bug emits a series of harsh clicks.

	The warriors freeze.

You know what this is...?

	Johnny makes an explosive sound. The Brain Bug slowly withdraws its palp.

Sure you do... You're a big fat smart

		bug, aren't you ?

	Johnny moves toward Carmen. The Brain Bug's multiple eyes track him.

	The warriors holding Carmen threaten. Johnny turns on the brain bug, 

	his finger on the nuke's trigger.

I'll take you with me.

	The Brain Bug clicks. The warriors back off. Carmen collapses.

	Johnny reaches for her.

Take my hand !

	Chariot bugs move the Brain Bug down a hole. Workers seal the hole

	behind it with amazing speed. Johnny drags Carmen back toward the 

	tunnel he entered from. The warriors charge.

Roughnecks...NOW !

	Johnny throws himself on top of Carmen as the Roughnecks burst into

	the chamber, guns blazing. The fight is furious, point blank, deadly to

	bug and Roughneck alike. 

	Sugar Watkins screams as a warrior rips his arm off. Zander takes a

	claw through the gut.

He blows it away, sees his intestines hanging out of the wound, shoves

	them back inside and keeps on fighting. A warrior rears up over Johnny

	and Carmen.

Weapon !

	Ace throws him a Morita. Johnny catches it, pumps three rounds into the 

	bug's nerve stem. He struggles out from under the dead warrior.

	Every bug in the chamber is dead.

Are you hurt ?

	Carmen throws her arms around Johnny.

Johnny...!

	Zander takes this in. Carmen sees him, then his wound.

Zander...! Oh, you're hurt.

	Ace takes a look at his wound, makes a face.

Ah geez...

	Zander pushes him away, struggles to his feet.
Can you walk ?

(clenched teeth)

		Not a problem.

Let's get some armor on her, and

		the we'll get outa this stinkin 

		bug hole !

	Various components are gladly passed forward. Johnny and Ace 

	help her putting it on.

I thought I was dead. Lucky for

		me you jokers showed up, eh ?

It wasn't luck. Rico ignored the

		mission objective to rescue you...
Is it true ?

Yeah, if I live through this, 

		they'll probably hang me.

		Now com'on, let's move out !

heading.subject: THE ROUGHNECKS
heading.raw_text: 175	INT	BUG CITY TUNNELS - DAY - THE ROUGHNECKS

segments.content: double-time it, racing for the surface. They come to a fork.
Which way ?

Up. We gotta be near A Company 

		by now.

	The tunnel floor drops out. FIVE ROUGHNECKS disappear into the hole.

	WARRIORS climb up into the tunnel.

The Roughnecks bachk up fast, shooting. Zander staggers, collapses.

	Johnny drops to his side, rolls him over.
How bad are you, pal ?

Been better, buddy.

	Johnny sees warriors coming up into the tunnel by the score.
Alright, we're gonna carry you...

Nah, I figureyou folks oughta get 

		upstairs before it's too late...

		Gimmee the nuke.

	Zander checks his pulse cannon's available power.
Don't be a hero...

This is my farm. Now c'mon, give

		me what you got and get out of

		here...

	Johnny nods, hands him the nuke. Carmen sees what's happening.
Zander, what are you doing ?

Just giving you something to

		remember me by, baby.

Zander, no...!

	He grabs her and kisses her. Johnny drags Carmen away. Zander opens 

	fire as the first warriors reach his position.

heading.subject: 176	INT	BUG CITY
heading.raw_text: 176	INT	BUG CITY - INCLINED TUNNEL - DAY - JOHNNY AND CARMEN

segments.content:
race desperately for the surface. They hear the chatter of Zander's pulse cannon

	and the screams of dying bugs.
Tears stream down from Carmen's face.

heading.subject: 177	EXT	PLANET P
heading.raw_text: 177	EXT	PLANET P - DAY - JOHNNY AND CARMEN

segments.content:
and the surviving Roughnecks make it to the surface. 	WOMP !

	A subterrenean nuclear explosion blows a column of earth and stone

	into the air.

heading.subject: Y BASE CAMP
heading.raw_text: 178	EXT	PLANET P - A COMPANY BASE CAMP - JOHNNY

segments.content:
and the others enter A Company's perimeter. No one notices their arrival

	because everyone's gathered in a big circle watching the Brain Bug.

Look... they got it.

	Several of its delicate legs were apparently broken during the capture.

	Carl approaches it without fear, puts his hand on the thing.

What's it thinking, Colonel ?

	Carl smiles in a cruel way.

It's afraid.

	Johnny and Carmen approach the General.

Sir, I'd like to turn myself in.

		Dereliction of duty by an officer

		during wartime.
And you freely admit to it ?
Yes, sir.

Is what this man says true,

		Lieutenant ?

To the best of my understanding,

		i
